title: Direction of force on charge at top of triangle

content.question: Three point charges, +q, +Q, and -Q, are fixed at the corners of an isosceles triangle in the plane of the page, as shown above. Which arrow in the figure represents the direction of the net electrostatic force on charge +q due to the other two equal and opposite charges?
